mapper.select: SELECT m_name,m_id,m_pass,m_tel,m_email,m_addr||' '||m_addr_detail m_addr,m_postcode,m_grade,m_sub FROM member WHERE m_grade!='운영자'
SELECT m_name,m_id,m_pass,m_tel,m_email,m_addr||' '||m_addr_detail m_addr,m_postcode,m_grade,m_sub FROM member WHERE m_grade='운영자'
UPDATE product SET P_NAME = #{p_name},P_CAT = #{p_cat},P_PRICE = #{p_price},P_QUAN = #{p_quan},P_BRAND = #{p_brand},P_COLOR = #{p_color},P_DETAIL = #{p_detail} WHERE P_ID = #{p_id}

select sum(a) from (select ol.o_id ,ol.ol_id , p.p_id , p.p_name ,p.p_price as a ,to_char(po.o_date,'MM') from orderlist ol , product p , productorder po where ol.p_id = p.p_id and ol.o_id = po.o_id and to_char(po.o_date,'MM')=#{month} order by ol.o_id)

select sum(a) from (select ol.o_id ,ol.ol_id , p.p_id , p.p_name ,p.p_price as a ,to_char(po.o_date,'MM') from orderlist ol , product p , productorder po where ol.p_id = p.p_id and ol.o_id = po.o_id and p.p_cat = #{category} order by ol.o_id)

select sum(a) from (select ol.o_id "주문번호",ol.ol_id "주문목록번호" , p.p_id "상품아이디" , p.p_name "상품이름" ,p.p_price as a ,to_char(po.o_date,'MM') "주문 날짜" from orderlist ol , product p , productorder po where ol.p_id = p.p_id and ol.o_id = po.o_id AND to_char(po.o_date,'mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate-#{day},'mm-dd') order by ol.o_id)
select count(v_date) from visit where to_char(v_date,'YY/MM/DD') = to_char(sysdate-#{view},'YY/MM/DD')

select sum(a) from (select ol.o_id "주문번호",ol.ol_id "주문목록번호" , p.p_id "상품아이디" , p.p_name "상품이름" ,p.p_price as a ,to_char(po.o_date,'MM') "주문 날짜" from orderlist ol , product p , productorder po , member m where ol.p_id = p.p_id and ol.o_id = po.o_id and m.m_id = po.m_id and m_age like #{age}||'%' order by ol.o_id)
mapper.update: update productorder set o_delivery=#{o_delivery} where o_id=#{o_id}
